text: is a Japanese village in the Ogasawara Subprefecture of Tokyo.McCormack, Gavan. "Dilemmas of Development on The Ogasawara Islands," JPRI Occasional Paper, No. 15 (August 1999). Japan Policy Research Institute (University of San Francisco). Retrieved 2013-2-27. ==History== In 1940, municipalities were created for groups and single isolated islands in the Pacific Ocean.
